techmeme.title: Edward Coristine, a 19-year-old member of DOGE, was fired from an internship at cybersecurity firm Path Network for allegedly sharing info with a competitor (Bloomberg)
Sources: Stripe competitor Rapyd is in talks to raise $300M from investors at a $3.5B valuation, a dramatic decline from its valuation of around $9B in 2021 (Bloomberg)
Elon Musk says he will rehire a DOGE staffer who resigned following the exposure of his posts advocating for racism and eugenics, after Trump endorsed the idea (CNBC)
DeepMind says its AlphaGeometry2 model solved 84% of International Math Olympiad's geometry problems from the last 25 years, surpassing average gold medalists (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Hugging Face researchers release "Open Deep Research" an open-source AI agent created in 24 hours, aiming to match OpenAI's Deep Research performance (Benj Edwards/Ars Technica)
